name: GEOM (itch)
description:
GEOM is an abstract, relaxation/creative experience for the Oculus Rift and LEAP Motion. 

Flying over an endless ocean, you are free to create an endless stream of unlimited forms. A powerful automation system allows you to set up ever more intricate displays of motion, colour and beauty.

Turned from a brief experiment into a fully-fledged VR experience for the Leap Motion 3D Jam.

Music by the amazing Chris Zabriskie.
